info.description: API for managing trips, routes, buses, and operators in the bus booking system
info.title: Trip Service API

get.description: Get a paginated list of buses, optionally filtered by operator

post.description: Create a new bus with operator, model, and seat capacity information

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific bus

put.description: Update bus information such as model, plate number, or amenities

get.description: Get all seats for a specific bus
Get a paginated list of routes, optionally filtered by operator

post.description: Create a new route with origin, destination, and distance information

get.description: Search routes by origin and destination
Get detailed information about a specific route

put.description: Update route information such as origin, destination, or distance

get.description: Get all trips for a specific route on a given date
get.summary: List trips by route and date

post.description: Create a new trip with route, bus, and schedule information
Search for available trips based on origin, destination, and other criteria

get.description: Get detailed information about a specific trip

put.description: Update trip information such as schedule, price, or status

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
